ComicInfo.Series: Danger Doll Squad Presents: Amalgama Lives
ComicInfo.Summary:
Featured on Halloween Comic Fest and spinning out of the events of the last Danger Doll Squad series, it’s the solo debut of the all-new fan-favorite mash-up character (featuring the powers of Zombie Tramp, Vampblade, and DollFace combined) in her own cosmic origin story!!
The next big Danger Zone series starts here, with covers from some of the series’ hottest artists (each with their own risqué variant as well)!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marcelo Trom | 3 | | D | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 4 | | E | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part One
